#summary Operations planned for 0.8

most important set of operation planned for delaboratory 0.8

typical workflow:

  * set WB with single mouse click on gray area (set A and B in LAB to 0.0)
  * apply green channel in luminance mode (apply GREEN in RGB, use luminance mode)
  * RGB curves
  * vignette (on L channel in LAB)
  * USM (in RGB)

additional steps:

  * dodge/burn on L channel in LAB
  * CMYK curves
  * luminance curve (L in LAB)
  * saturation slider (AB in LAB)

these operations should be quickly available for user
